underlying_goal: Fix a database connection pool exhaustion error (MaxClientsInSessionMode) in their Supabase-backed FastAPI application
friction_detail: Claude initially proposed a connection pooling fix but user questioned why the simpler port 6543 (transaction mode) approach wasn't used first, requiring Claude to pivot.
brief_summary: User hit a MaxClientsInSessionMode database error; Claude diagnosed it and switched to Supabase transaction mode (port 6543), resolving the issue.
